Question: This person also played three special concerts produced by jazz aficionado and Chicago socialite Helen Oakley.
Hints: The idea of an electrified guitar didn't appeal, and this person didn't care for Christian's flashy style of dressing.
This person's musical papers were donated to Yale University after his death.
This person's first classical recording dates from April 25, 1938 when he recorded Mozart's Clarinet Quintet in A major, K.
